show.title: The Awakening
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/xtePE2
show.description:
When ancient curses bleed into modern chaos, a forgotten warrior awakens. Raghav, reborn with lost powers, must protect the woman he loves amid a storm of betrayal and political war.
But to save the future, he must first conquer the shadows of a past he can barely remember.
show.description_secondary:
When ancient curses bleed into modern chaos, a forgotten warrior awakens. Raghav, reborn with lost powers, must protect the woman he loves amid a storm of betrayal and political war.
But to save the future, he must first conquer the shadows of a past he can barely remember.
